name: Stealth Santa (sh06114)
description:
santa go brrr

santa - wasd to move, mouse to rotate, click to throw, go in front of door or kill all the snowmans to win, snowball will bring you back to start position.

snowman- no move, mouse to rotate, click to throw snowball, left and right arrow key to change view to other snowman. win if time is over or santa waste all the gifts.
